articles.title: Mikaela Shiffrin sets World Cup skiing record with 87th win - The Associated Press - en Español
articles.description: ARE, Sweden (AP) — Two minutes after earning her 87th career win, Mikaela Shiffrin  finally understood the significance of setting the record for most World Cup victories.
